title: hugo & marie type id
content:
can anyone identity these 2 faces? I'm thinking they could be custom, but let me know if you have any ideas... thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014165315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gp_4325.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014165315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hm_6698.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014165315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gp2_4895.jpg)
author: shn

comments.content: Nevermind! just heard back from the designer (mario hugo). All are custom! thanks anyway typophile. :)

If you're interested in similars:

[Brasserie](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014165315/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=)  
 [Handle Oldstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014165315/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/handle_oldstyle_std_regular/)  
 [Diamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014165315/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=536) (Luxury Fonts)
